Despre.title: ABOUT ME
Despre.p1: My name is Mihaela Bordeianu, I am a personal trainer, nutrition technician, and professional athlete.
Despre.p2: Since childhood, I have been attracted to sports and competition, investing a lot of passion in every sports activity I engaged in, but I also faced many of the common difficulties for a beginner, such as lack of self-confidence and dissatisfaction with my own physical shape. With such a mindset and without solid knowledge, progress was slow to appear.

p3.1: As I delved deeper into this field,
p3.2: I realized that nutrition plays an essential role
p3.3: and I continued to specialize in this direction. I believe that no one can follow a strict diet indefinitely, which is why I teach those I work with to be flexible, to integrate less healthy foods into their diet, and at the same time, to achieve and maintain their long-term goals.

p4.3: , not a short-term compromise, which is why it is essential to find the optimal approach, both in diet and training, for your goals and lifestyle.
